hanzi-su-wiki:
掛

Значения

Висеть; касаться, цепляться; иметь дело; зависеть; звонить по телефону; приступать, браться; идти (о фильме); попадать на; вешать, класть, накидывать; лить, посыпать; садиться; тратить, расходовать; умножать; звонить; отношение, касательство, ведение; ответственный; расходы, налоги; начало

Мнемоника

Скипетр 圭 на право владения 扌 землей. Подвешен в доме на видном месте и является результатом предсказания 卜 судьбы.

Варианты

挂
purpleculture_pinyin:
guà
to hang or suspend (from a hook etc); to hang up (the phone); (of a line) to be dead; to be worried or concerned; to make a phone call (dialect); to register or record; classifier for sets or clusters of objects; (slang) to kill; to die; to be finished; to fail (an exam)
подвешивать или подвешивать (на крючок и т. д.); повесить трубку (телефон); (линии) быть мертвым; быть обеспокоенным или обеспокоенным; позвонить по телефону (диалект); для регистрации или записи; классификатор для наборов или кластеров объектов; (сленг) убивать; умереть; быть законченным; провалить (экзамен)
rtega_mnemonic:
掛掛RS
挂挂		hang, suspend, suspense
  • hand 扌 of the fortune teller 卜 in which the fate of somebody is hanging during the fortune telling ceremony 卦
  • ⓢ object 圭 hanging in a hand 扌
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 挂)
Pictophonetic: 卦 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
掛牌 [ guà pái ]: lit. to hang up a plate; to open up for business; listed (on stock market)
掛鉤 [ guà gōu ]: hook (on which to hang sth); to couple; to link together; to establish contact with; hook; coupling links (e.g. between two railway coaches)
掛職 [ guà zhí ]: temporary assignment to a Chinese government or CCP post
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 卦 [ guà ] divination, fortune-telling
heisig_chinese_memo: Think RPG. The wizard points his finger to the guard and the ivy he has just animated with his magic wand climbs down the wall to hang the poor guy, opening the way for the adventurers into the dungeon.
heisig_constituent: hang, finger, fingers, ivy, square jewel, soil, dirt, ground, magic wand, augury, soil2, dirt2, ground2
Keyword_KANJIDIC: hang, suspend, depend, arrive at, tax, pour
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: зависание, приостановить, зависит, прийти, налог, влить
koohiiStory1: Think RPG. The wizard points his finger to the guard and the ivy he has just animated with his magic wand climbs down the wall to hang the poor guy, opening the way for the adventurers into the dungeon.
koohiiStory2: 3 ways you could hang something: 1) the normal way, with your finger putting something on a hook or whatever, 2) hanging from a vine the natural way, or 3) by means of the magic of the wand.
kunYomi: か.ける、-か.ける、か.け、-か.け、-が.け、か.かる、-か.かる、-が.かる、か.かり、-が.かり、かかり、-がかり
jp_example_words:
掛かる(かかる): take (time), need, cost
掛け(かけ): credit
切っ掛け(きっかけ): chance, start, cue, excuse, motive, impetus, occasion
心掛け(こころがけ): readiness, intention, aim
心掛ける(こころがける): to bear in mind, to aim to do
差し掛かる(さしかかる): to come near to, to approach
仕掛け(しかけ): device, trick, mechanism, gadget, (small) scale, half finished, commencement, set up, challenge
仕掛ける(しかける): to commence, to lay (mines), to set (traps), to wage (war), to challenge
手掛かり(てがかり): contact, trail, scent, on hand, hand hold, clue, key
手掛ける(てがける): to handle, to manage, to work with, to rear, to look after, to have experience with
引っ掛ける(ひっかける): to hang (something) on (something), to throw on (clothes), to hook, to catch, to trap, to ensnare, to cheat, to evade payment, to jump a bill, to drink (alcohol), to spit at (a person), to hit the ball off the end of the bat (baseball)
見掛ける(みかける): to (happen to) see, to notice, to catch sight of
寄り掛かる(よりかかる): to lean against, to recline on, to lean on, to rely on
追い掛ける(おいかける): pursue, chase
お出掛け(おでかけ): about to start out, just about to leave or go out
お目に掛かる(おめにかかる): to see or meet someone
思い掛けない(おもいがけない): unexpected, casual
掛け算(かけざん): multiplication
掛ける(かける): wear, put on, hang, cover, sit down, make a phone call, multiply, turn on (a switch), play (a record), begin to
腰掛け(こしかけ): seat, bench
腰掛ける(こしかける): sit (down)
出掛ける(でかける): depart, set out, start, be going out
通り掛かる(とおりかかる): happen to pass by
話し掛ける(はなしかける): accost a person, talk (to someone)
引っ掛かる(ひっかかる): be caught in, be stuck in, be cheated
見掛け(みかけ): outward appearance
呼び掛ける(よびかける): call out to, accost, address (crowd), make an appeal
jp_readingExamples: 掛かる (か.かる), 掛ける (か.ける), 掛 (かかり)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Somebody got dirt on your fingers and dirt on your toes so you're going to hang them upside-down and slap them with your dirty extremities.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: If someone got dirt all up in your finger and toe business wouldn't you want to hang them too?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You have this person hanging upside-down but they don't seem to be suffering enough, so you hit them with your car (か). No mercy.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Don't get dirt on me, buddy. Or I'll hang you upside-down and hit you with my car. Then you'll be sorry.
Ru_Russian: вешать, набрасывать, класть, надевать, обрызгивать, посыпать, поливать, делать ставку
Ru_Meaning: hang, suspend, depend, arrive at, tax, pour
Ru_Words:
掛けるかける
  • вешать, набрасывать, надевать
  • обрызгивать, посыпать, поливать
  • тратить, расходовать
  • запускать (машину), заводить (часы), включать (радио, телевизор), звонить (по телефону)
  • умножать
    • 掛かるかかる
  • висеть
  • зацепляться, задевать за что-то
  • попадаться (напр. в ловушку)
  • зависеть от чего-то, требоваться (о времени, ресурсах)
    • 掛けかけ
  • кредит
  • счёт (на взятое в кредит), долг (за взятое в кредит)
  • ставка
    • 呼び掛けるよびかける
  • взывать, обращаться к кому-либо, призывать кого-л. к чему-л
  • окликать
    • warodai
    仕掛けるしかける
  • начинать, приступать к чему-л
  • устанавливать, монтировать, приспособлять, закладывать (мину)
  • вызывать (на ссору, на бой)
    • warodai
    出掛けるでかける
  • выходить, отправляться
    • warodai
    見掛けるみかける
  • видеть, замечать
    • warodai
    問い掛けるといかける
  • задавать вопросы, спрашивать
  • начать спрашивать, начать расспросы
    • warodai
    心掛けこころがけ
  • намерения, помыслы
  • забота, внимание, предусмотрительность, старания
    • warodai
Ru_trainchinese:
guà: (глаг) вешать
guà: (глаг) вешать (трубку телефона); беспокоиться; цеплять(ся); быть покрытым (чем-то); регистрироваться (в больнице); откладывать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hand (扌) uses the divining rod (卜) to find the jewel (圭) that's hanging
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Children like to hang down from the tops of brick ivy walls with their fingers gripping the edge.
humanum_full_description_en:
This is " hanging ", and later written as " hanging ". "Shuowen": "Hanging, painting." Zhu Junsheng "Shuowen Tongxun Dingsheng": "Words are also hanging." The original meaning of " hanging " is distinction. Such as "Zhou Yi. "Xi Ci": "Divided into two to make two images, hang one to make three images." Kong Yingdashu: "For the two instruments, in the number of days, hang one of the two instruments, and match the two instruments to the image and three talents. ."

The common meaning of " hang " is hanging. Such as "Wu Yue Chun Qiu. "Fuchai Internal Biography": "Yuan Cheng died before, hang my eyes at the door to observe the funeral of Wu." "Tong Dian. "Official Official Code": "At the time Wang Mang, (every) Mengjie's crown hangs on the East Gate and escapes."

The extension of " hanging " means wearing and covering. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Li Qi "Xia Yan Zhang Bing Cao Dongtang": "Drunk but hung Ge Jinmian, there is no parting in the Ming Dynasty." Qi Wuqian "Guo Rong Master Lan Ruo": "Mountain Zen room hang monk clothes, there is no river outside the window. Birds fly."

" Hanging " means care and concern. Liuyong of the Northern Song Dynasty "Ru Yushui": "Fame and fortune, plan to fight for a break, don't worry about right or wrong." "Jing Shi Tong Yan. "Qiao Yanjie's Concubine Breaks Home": "Auntie sees that the high officials will not return, she remembers that you have nothing to do with you, and teach me to send chai rice money to you."

" Pending " means recording and registration. For example, Yue Fei of the Southern Song Dynasty (Fengzhao Moves the Puppet Qilu): "Hanging today's rebellious party, the notoriety for thousands of years." Zhang Juzheng of the Ming Dynasty "Mingzhi style relies on the king's words": "All officials should give the emperor, and the ministry should issue Fengqin After arriving at the pavilion according to the manuscript, the writer of the narrative first issued the manuscript, sent it to the ministers for detailed revision, transcribed it into the submission, awaiting approval, and issued a red issue.

" Hang " can also be used as a quantifier. For example, Chapter 58 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "I had a dream last night. I dreamed that Apricot Flower God and I were asking for a penny." Chapter 4 of "Lao Can Travels": "Speaking of which, Wu Shi just cleaned up and chose A double set of speed cars rushed into the city."
humanum_short_description_en: This is " hanging ", and later written as " hanging ". The original meaning is to distinguish, the common meaning is to hang.
humanum_full_description:
本作「挂」，後寫作「掛」。《說文》：「挂，畫也。」朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「字亦作掛。」「掛」的本義是區分。如《周易．繫辭上》：「分而為二以象兩，掛一以象三。」孔穎達疏：「就兩儀之間，於天數之中，分掛其一，而配兩儀，以象三才也。」

　　「掛」的常用義是懸掛。如《吳越春秋．夫差內傳》：「員誠前死，掛吾目於門，以觀吳國之喪。」《通典．職官典》：「至王莽時，（逢）萌解冠掛東都門而遁。」

　　「掛」引申表示穿載、披掛。如唐代李頎〈夏宴張兵曹東堂〉：「醉來但掛葛巾眠，莫道明朝有離別。」綦毋潛〈過融上人蘭若〉：「山頭禪室掛僧衣，窗外無人溪鳥飛。」

　　「掛」表示牽念、牽掛。北宋柳永〈如魚水〉：「浮名利，擬拚休，是非莫掛心頭。」《警世通言．喬彥傑一妾破家》：「大娘見大官人不回，記掛你無盤纏，教我送柴米錢鈔與你用。」

　　「掛」表示記錄、登記。如南宋岳飛〈奉詔移偽齊檄〉：「掛今日之逆黨，連千載之惡名。」明代張居正〈明治體以重王言疏〉：「凡官員應給誥敕，該部題奉欽依手本到閣，撰述官先具稿，送臣等看詳改定，謄寫進呈，候批紅發下，撰述官用關防掛號，然後中書舍人寫軸用寶。」

　　「掛」還可作量詞。如《紅樓夢》第58回：「我昨夜做了個夢，夢見杏花神和我要一掛白錢。」《老殘遊記》第4回：「說著，吳氏就收拾收拾，選了一掛雙套飛車，趕進城去。」
humanum_short_description: 本作「挂」，後寫作「掛」。本義是區分，常用義是懸掛。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
掛 (Simplified: 挂)
Pinyin: guà
English Definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc); to hang up (the phone); (of a line) to be dead; to be worried or concerned; to make a phone call (dialect); to register or record; classifier for sets or clusters of objects; (slang) to kill; to die; to be finished; to fail (an exam)
Total strokes: 11; Radical: 手
Pictophonetic: 卦 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 卦 [ guà ] divination, fortune-telling
Example Words:
掛牌 [ guà pái ]: lit. to hang up a plate; to open up for business; listed (on stock market)
掛鉤 [ guà gōu ]: hook (on which to hang sth); to couple; to link together; to establish contact with; hook; coupling links (e.g. between two railway coaches)
掛職 [ guà zhí ]: temporary assignment to a Chinese government or CCP post
More: 掛* | *掛 | *掛*

gua4
HSK 4: 掛,挂
掛掛RS
挂挂 		hang, suspend, suspense
  • hand 扌 of the fortune teller 卜 in which the fate of somebody is hanging during the fortune telling ceremony 卦
  • ⓢ object 圭 hanging in a hand 扌
(Simplified: 挂)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 卦 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 卦 [ guà ] divination, fortune-telling
①藉助繩索、鉤子、釘子等使物體附着於高處或連到另一物體上：懸掛。掛圖。掛牌。掛鋤。掛鐮。掛帥(掌帥印，喻居於領導、統帥地位)。披紅掛綠。掛一漏萬。
②牽記，牽連，牽累：牽掛。記掛。掛念。掛連。掛累(連累)。
③登記：掛號。掛失。
④打電話，或放回耳機中止通話，亦指交換機接通電話：給小張掛個電話。
⑤鉤住：衣服被釘子掛住了。
⑥物體表面蒙上或糊着：臉上像掛了一層霜。
⑦量詞，多用於成套或成串的東西：一掛珠子。

掛鉤 [ guà gōu ]: hook (on which to hang sth); to couple; to link together; to establish contact with; hook; coupling links (e.g. between two railway coaches)
掛職 [ guà zhí ]: temporary assignment to a Chinese government or CCP post

見掛け(みかけ): outward appearance
呼び掛ける(よびかける): call out to, accost, address (crowd), make an appeal
本作「 挂 」，後寫作「 掛 」。《說文》：「挂，畫也。」朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「字亦作掛。」「 掛 」的本義是區分。如《周易．繫辭上》：「分而為二以象兩，掛一以象三。」孔穎達疏：「就兩儀之間，於天數之中，分掛其一，而配兩儀，以象三才也。」 「 掛 」的常用義是懸掛。如《吳越春秋．夫差內傳》：「員誠前死，掛吾目於門，以觀吳國之喪。」《通典．職官典》：「至王莽時，（逢）萌解冠掛東都門而遁。」 「 掛 」引申表示穿載、披掛。如唐代李頎〈夏宴張兵曹東堂〉：「醉來但掛葛巾眠，莫道明朝有離別。」綦毋潛〈過融上人蘭若〉：「山頭禪室掛僧衣，窗外無人溪鳥飛。」 「 掛 」表示牽念、牽掛。北宋柳永〈如魚水〉：「浮名利，擬拚休，是非莫掛心頭。」《警世通言．喬彥傑一妾破家》：「大娘見大官人不回，記掛你無盤纏，教我送柴米錢鈔與你用。」 「 掛 」表示記錄、登記。如南宋岳飛〈奉詔移偽齊檄〉：「掛今日之逆黨，連千載之惡名。」明代張居正〈明治體以重王言疏〉：「凡官員應給誥敕，該部題奉欽依手本到閣，撰述官先具稿，送臣等看詳改定，謄寫進呈，候批紅發下，撰述官用關防掛號，然後中書舍人寫軸用寶。」 「 掛 」還可作量詞。如《紅樓夢》第58回：「我昨夜做了個夢，夢見杏花神和我要一掛白錢。」《老殘遊記》第4回：「說著，吳氏就收拾收拾，選了一掛雙套飛車，趕進城去。」
This is " hanging", and later written as " hanging". "Shuowen": "Hanging, painting." Zhu Junsheng "Shuowen Tongxun Dingsheng": "Words are also hanging." The original meaning of " hanging" is distinction. Such as "Zhou Yi. "Xi Ci": "Divided into two to make two images, hang one to make three images." Kong Yingdashu: "For the two instruments, in the number of days, hang one of the two instruments, and match the two instruments to the image and three talents. ." The common meaning of " hang" is hanging. Such as "Wu Yue Chun Qiu. "Fuchai Internal Biography": "Yuan Cheng died before, hang my eyes at the door to observe the funeral of Wu." "Tong Dian. "Official Official Code": "At the time Wang Mang, (every) Mengjie's crown hangs on the East Gate and escapes." The extension of " hanging" means wearing and covering. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Li Qi "Xia Yan Zhang Bing Cao Dongtang": "Drunk but hung Ge Jinmian, there is no parting in the Ming Dynasty." Qi Wuqian "Guo Rong Master Lan Ruo": "Mountain Zen room hang monk clothes, there is no river outside the window. Birds fly." " Hanging" means care and concern. Liuyong of the Northern Song Dynasty "Ru Yushui": "Fame and fortune, plan to fight for a break, don't worry about right or wrong." "Jing Shi Tong Yan. "Qiao Yanjie's Concubine Breaks Home": "Auntie sees that the high officials will not return, she remembers that you have nothing to do with you, and teach me to send chai rice money to you." " Pending" means recording and registration. For example, Yue Fei of the Southern Song Dynasty (Fengzhao Moves the Puppet Qilu): "Hanging today's rebellious party, the notoriety for thousands of years." Zhang Juzheng of the Ming Dynasty "Mingzhi style relies on the king's words": "All officials should give the emperor, and the ministry should issue Fengqin After arriving at the pavilion according to the manuscript, the writer of the narrative first issued the manuscript, sent it to the ministers for detailed revision, transcribed it into the submission, awaiting approval, and issued a red issue. " Hang" can also be used as a quantifier. For example, Chapter 58 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "I had a dream last night. I dreamed that Apricot Flower God and I were asking for a penny." Chapter 4 of "Lao Can Travels": "Speaking of which, Wu Shi just cleaned up and chose A double set of speed cars rushed into the city."

掛字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　掛； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页438第05
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】古賣切【正韻】古畫切，?音卦。別也。　又揲筮，置著小指閒也。【易·繫辭】掛一以象三。【註】置而不用曰掛。【又】再扐而後掛。【註】合而置之曰掛。【朱子·本義】掛者，懸於左手小指之閒。　又【正韻】與掛同。【易·乾卦疏】易緯云：卦者，掛也。言懸掛物象以示於人。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古買切，音柺。義同。陸德明易釋文有二音。

Radicals: 扌, 土, ト  (fingers, dirt, toe)
Meaning Mnemonic
Somebody got dirt on your fingers and dirt on your toes so you're going to hang them upside-down and slap them with your dirty extremities.
If someone got dirt all up in your finger and toe business wouldn't you want to hang them too?
Reading Mnemonic
You have this person hanging upside-down but they don't seem to be suffering enough, so you hit them with your car (か). No mercy.
Don't get dirt on me, buddy. Or I'll hang you upside-down and hit you with my car. Then you'll be sorry.

Examples: 掛かる (か.かる), 掛ける (か.ける), 掛 (かかり)
卜 (гадание), 土 (земля), 扎
掛けるかける
  • вешать, набрасывать, надевать
  • обрызгивать, посыпать, поливать
  • тратить, расходовать
  • запускать (машину), заводить (часы), включать (радио, телевизор), звонить (по телефону)
  • умножать
    • 掛かるかかる
  • висеть
  • зацепляться, задевать за что-то
  • попадаться (напр. в ловушку)
  • зависеть от чего-то, требоваться (о времени, ресурсах)
    • 掛けかけ
  • кредит
  • счёт (на взятое в кредит), долг (за взятое в кредит)
  • ставка
    • 呼び掛けるよびかける
  • взывать, обращаться к кому-либо, призывать кого-л. к чему-л
  • окликать
    • warodai
    仕掛けるしかける
  • начинать, приступать к чему-л
  • устанавливать, монтировать, приспособлять, закладывать (мину)
  • вызывать (на ссору, на бой)
    • warodai
    出掛けるでかける
  • выходить, отправляться
    • warodai
    見掛けるみかける
  • видеть, замечать
    • warodai
    問い掛けるといかける
  • задавать вопросы, спрашивать
  • начать спрашивать, начать расспросы
    • warodai
    心掛けこころがけ
  • намерения, помыслы
  • забота, внимание, предусмотрительность, старания
    • warodai
